name: Ludomania
description:
Ludomania - a one-of-a-kind app you can play the most popular variations of the medieval Indian board game with: Pachisi!

Gather with your close ones and enjoy the game!

No company at hand?

Play against artificial intelligence and hone your skills!

You can play classic Ludo, the world-famous game.

Or get closer to the roots of the game - Ludo Indian.

Not enough? Try Parchís - really popular in Spain!

Want even more? Play "Don't Get Mad!" - a simpler variant made and popularized by the Germans.

Come on, try it out!
